param.name: genomic_region
param.label: Genomic region, can be: tss, tes, genebody, exon, cgi

param.name: flanking_region_size1
param.label: Flanking region size(optional, default varies by type: tss=2000;tes=2000;genebody=2000;exon=500;cgi=500)

param.name: flanking_region_size2
param.label: Flanking region size(optional, default varies by type: tss=2000;tes=2000;genebody=2000;exon=500;cgi=500)

param.name: further_information1
param.label: If you select genebody, further information can be provided for specific regions to plot: ChIP-seq(default), RNA-seq

param.name: flanking_region_option3
param.label: Choose one method of below two options for plotting flanking region
param.option: Using floating size with interval size

param.name: flanking_region_size3
param.label: Flanking region size(optional, default varies by type: tss=1000;tes=1000;genebody=1000;exon=500;cgi=500;bed=1000)

param.name: specify_flanking_region3
param.label: Set specify flanking region as a multiple(or fraction) of interval size, can be less than 1. In this case, flanking region has floating size with interval size. default: 33%

param.name: further_information2
param.label: If you select exon, further information can be provided for specific regions to plot: canonical(default), variant, promoter, polyA, altAcceptor, altDonor, altBoth

param.name: flanking_region_option4
param.label: Choose one method of below two options for plotting flanking region
param.option: Using floating size with interval size

param.name: flanking_region_size4
param.label: Flanking region size(optional, default varies by type: tss=1000;tes=1000;genebody=1000;exon=500;cgi=500;bed=1000)

param.name: specify_flanking_region4
param.label: Set specify flanking region as a multiple(or fraction) of interval size, can be less than 1. In this case, flanking region has floating size with interval size. default: 33%

param.name: further_information3
param.label: If you select cgi, further information can be provided for specific regions to plot: proximalpromoter(default), genebody, genedesert, otherintergenic, pericentromere, promoter1k, promoter3k

param.name: flanking_region_option5
param.label: Choose one method of below two options for plotting flanking region
param.option: Using floating size with interval size

param.name: flanking_region_size5
param.label: Flanking region size(optional, default varies by type: tss=1000;tes=1000;genebody=1000;exon=500;cgi=500;bed=1000)

param.name: specify_flanking_region5
param.label: Set specify flanking region as a multiple(or fraction) of interval size, can be less than 1. In this case, flanking region has floating size with interval size. default: 33%

param.name: sel_bam_file_number
param.label: Choose how many data source for multiplot

param.name: bam_file2_gene_list_detail1
param.label: Choose the uploaded gene list for plotting

param.name: standard_error
param.label: Boolean tag for plotting standard errors

param.name: radius_size
param.label: The fraction of extreme values to be trimmed on both ends

param.name: smooth_method

param.name: shaded_area
param.label: Opacity of shaded area, suggested value:[0, 0.5]
